npcs.name: Lady Mirelle of Ashford
npcs.blurb: Keeps a glittering salon near the throne room. Coins buy artists; favor buys access.

npcs.name: Owen the Barge-Master
npcs.blurb: Runs three rafts through the river tolls. Timing is his weapon, moorage his leverage.

npcs.name: Ilan the Quiet Scribe
npcs.blurb: Copies ledgers twice—one for the Crown, one for the night. Ink hides more than words.

npcs.name: Rotem the Wharf Baker
npcs.blurb: Feeds stevedores at dawn. Flour thin, tempers thinner when grain runs late.

npcs.name: Beadle Marta
npcs.blurb: Carries the charter and a cudgel of fines. Quotas first, excuses later.

npcs.name: Bursar Abel
npcs.blurb: Counts coppers for candles and stone. Promises blessings, tallies receipts.

npcs.name: Seren the Night Factor
npcs.blurb: Moves goods when shutters close. Knows which guards prefer warm hands to cold orders.

npcs.name: Hana of the Quarry
npcs.blurb: Stone, teams, and bruised knuckles. Cathedral or courthouse—her blocks make reputations.

npcs.name: Yakob the Miller
npcs.blurb: Grinds the town’s grain; hears every rumor in the queue. Stones slow without coin.

npcs.name: Tomas the Page
npcs.blurb: Runs notes between antechambers. Knows who waits, and who never must.

requests.title: Clear the Barge Lane
requests.text: Advisor, moorage’s tight and daylight’s short. Slip me a slot at the pier and I’ll turn two runs before dusk—your office takes a clean share.

options.label: Bargain: Buy dock priority and sell throughput

requests.title: Rush Grain Subsidy
requests.text: Good day, milord—stake me for night milling and I’ll keep the loaves steady. You skim the Crown’s stipend while I keep the stones turning.

options.label: Bargain: Night milling push for higher stipend

requests.title: Charter Grace Window
requests.text: Advisor, the charter allows spacing of fines—if properly petitioned. Authorize my grace window and your office keeps a handling cut today.

options.label: Bargain: Broker spaced fines for immediate cut

requests.title: Salon Introduction
requests.text: Advisor, sponsor a poet and I shall admit your petitions at my salon. Properly presented, such graces return in due course.

requests.title: Night Window Run
requests.text: With the right doors ajar, we pass unseen and take a sweet margin. You provide the cover; I’ll see the crates delivered.

requests.title: Buy the Morning Tide Slot
requests.text: Dawn moorage is the whole game, advisor. Stake the fee and I’ll turn two loads before noon—your office skims the clean throughput.

options.label: Bargain: Buy priority, sell extra turns
Bargain: Swap a rival’s block for ours

requests.title: Steady the Wharf Loaves
requests.text: Morning, love—front me a little and I’ll fire the ovens through the night; cheap loaves keep tempers cool and we split the stipend trickle.

options.label: Bargain: Night-bake rush on relief price

requests.title: Extend Audit Grace on Fines
requests.text: By charter clause, spacing is permitted with cause. Authorize my grace window, and a handling cut shall post to your line today.

options.label: Bargain: Broker spaced dues for immediate cut

requests.title: Quiet Audience Pass
requests.text: If you sponsor a tasteful diversion, I can float your note to the top. Discretion assured—and doors open, softly.

options.label: Bargain: Bundle introductions for later cuts

requests.title: Run the Black-Book Circuit
requests.text: With the right doors ajar, we ghost the crates and the margin sings. You keep the cover neat; I’ll count the profits.

integration_log: Appended day index 2; preserved canonical shell (version, economy, resource_types).
Kept tag_pool at 6 tags; all new-day request tags already in pool.
No cross-day request ID collisions; no renames needed.
Validated IF schemas on new day; none removed; no locked keys present.
Updated state_digest: added day 2 order map, new request IDs, availability gates, and chance modifier atoms; coins-touch verified for all 5 new requests.
